channel.title: [RSC] Rune Gods / 2 Servers/ All Working Skills / Full Npc Spawn / Working Shops
channel.description:
[IMG]http://runegods.ucoz.com/logo2.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][B] Classic Server Info[/B][/SIZE] ---------------------------[B] - all skill working. - working prayer. - potion working. - working shops. - working Npc drops. - working Wildy levels. - full Npc Spawn. - working Bows. - working Npc aggressive. - working Defence levels. - working mage. - WEBCLIENT [/B]--------------
[SIZE=4][B]Specs[/B][/SIZE] [B]--------- - 30MB Connection - 2GB Ram - 300 GB HD - Dual Core[/B] [B]----------------------[/B]
[B][SIZE=4][U][B][B]317 Server Info[/B][/B][/U][/SIZE] [/B]----------------------- [B] [B]Combat:[/B] --------- [U]Melee: - 100%[/U] - Special attacks on each special weapon. - Calculations are pretty much correct. - Defense bonuses will make your opponent hit less. ------------------------------------------------------ [U]Range: - 100%[/U] - All range weapons work. - Weapon specials work, including dark bow, and much more. - Projectiles and delayed hits. - Correctly timed hits on things like darts and knives. ------------------------------------------------------- [U]Magic: - 100%[/U] - All spells apart from a few work. - ancients. - lunar. - god staffs. - teli block. - Correct rune amounts and levels needed for each spell. ----------------------------------------------------------- [U]defence: - 100%[/U] - Defense bonuses will make your opponent hit less. ------------------------------------------------------ [U]prayer: - 100%[/U] - correct levels. - all prayers working. - piety. - chivalry. - bone burrying. ---------------- [B][B]Skills:[/B][/B] ------ [U]-Mining 100%[/U] - correct levels. - All rocks work. ---------------- [U]-ess Mining 100%[/U] - Full Rune ess mining. - Correct animations. ---------------------- [U]-Smithing 90%[/U] - Levels are all correct - smithing you receive gold ---------------------------- [U]-Fire Making 100%[/U] - correct levels. - Full burning. - all logs can burn.[/B][B][U] -Fishing 80%[/U] - Fishing spots all in the correct spots. - Correct calculations on random catches. - All spots use the correct item needed. ----------------------------------------- [U]-Herblore 90%[/U] - Correct levels - All potions are makeable. - Correct levels for each potion. --------------------------------- [U]-Slayer 100%[/U] - Talk to slayer master for task. - Required items to kill different monsters. - Enchanted gem shows your progress. - Slayer tower is full of slayer monsters. ----------------------------------------- [U]-Crafting 100%[/U] - power ammy. - str ammy. - fury. - all hide making. ----------------- [U]-thieving 100%[/U] - npc thieving. - stall thieving.
[U]-agility 100%[/U] - full agility course. - full working agility. --------------------- [U]-fletching 100%[/U] - flax picking. - bow string making. - all bows makable. - correct levels. ---------------- [U]-woodcutting 100%[/U] - correct levels. - all trees can be cut. - dragon axe working. ---------------------- [U]-cooking 100%[/U] - correct levels. - lobsters can be cooked. - sharks can be cooked. - sword fish can be cooked. [/B]----------------------------[B][U] -runecafting 100%[/U] - correct levels. - all runes can be crafted in abbys. ------------------------------------ [B][B]Minigames:[/B][/B] ----------- [U]jad: 100%[/U] - 6 waves. - kill jad for fire cape. ---------------------- [U]Pest Control: 50%[/U] - item exchange. - Waiting boat.
[U]Barrows: 100%[/U] - Coffins spawn the NPC. - Random tunnel. - All NPCs have their effects. ------------------------------ [U]assult: 100%[/U] - kill npc for points. - points tradable for items. ---------------------------- [U]god wars: 100%[/U] - kill saradomin wizards for points. - 20 points to inter boss area. - kill bandos boss for items. ----------------------------- [B][B]Bosses:[/B][/B] -------- [U]king black dragon: 100%[/U] - kill for special items. ----------------------- [U]kalphite queen: 100%[/U] - kill for special items. - kill for chest key. [B]------------------- [B]Clue Scrolls[/B][/B] ------------ [U]Clue Scrolls 100%[/U] -get different items from clues -monsters drop different clues[/B] --------------------------------
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/11813s3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2elbneb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2elgw9g.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/28qxhc4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/5n84zp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/207031x.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/536xow.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/51c1h1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/33x8mf8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/rrmh6h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/fuqaur.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ebfiw4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/zyhflh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2yl7bkx.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/67jic2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/9i76si.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/kq645.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/122i7uu.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2d1viuq.jpg[/img]

item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

Why try to replicate RSC? RSCA has, stopped because it’s already released to the public again every 6 months. Nobody is interested in replicas anymore. They’ve all played something similar to it, and got bored after a few days.

item.title: [RSC] Rune Gods / 2 Servers/ All Working Skills / Full Npc Spawn / Working Shops
item.dc:creator: @pafto pafto
item.description:
@pafto wrote:

The development of this server is in the direction of making it EXACTLY like runescape classic, but with higher rates. EasyRSC has a lot of the basic coding needed to start the server and is pretty much where everyone starts. Don’t flame someone for starting at the beginning… Everyone else did too. Currently the Skill xp rates are entirely too high and will be reduced as soon as the developers get around to it. Quests will be added soon and a little tweaking here and there to make everything as close as possible to RSC before there is any custom work. Any custom work will be events and things of that nature. If you are looking for full dragon armor or other non rsc crap then feel free to go somewhere else.

If you are looking for a server with 100% uptime, friendly staff and high rates feel free to give this server a try.

There is no need to flame this thread or anything I have to say. Im not the owner, i dont help develop the server and I don’t appreciate being flamed for stating facts about a server i enjoy.

Read full topic
item.source: [RSC] Rune Gods / 2 Servers/ All Working Skills / Full Npc Spawn / Working Shops

It’s EasyRSC, nothing about it is stable.
